title: Mayachik
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Guatemalan
description: Restaurant, ecological hostel, and community center hosting cooking and other workshops. Offers a vegetarian menu. The cooking staff is Guatemalan and prepares traditional dishes in vegetarian variations and international plates. In a quiet, rural village, the space is tranquil and cosy, has Wi-Fi.
